attributes.action: Ask all UK citizens 18+ to vote on: Would you like to keep your EU citizenship?
attributes.background: UK citizens who have lived abroad for over fifteen years were denied a vote in the EU membership referendum. Now, millions may lose their EU citizenship without any say in the matter. We believe it is undemocratic to deny a vote to those whose right of citizenship will be affected by the outcome.

rejection.details:
We think you might want the same action as this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133603
